record.description: The removal of radioactive materials from a chain reactor must be performed with care. Here, Earl Cobb (Lemont, Illinois) measures the amount of radiation given off by the material that is being removed by Elmer W. Rylander (Bloomington, Illinois). The radioactive material is contained in the aluminum can that is removed with the aid of tongs.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: The caption is tearing off, and "File Copy" is stamped across the photo. Stamp: Please return to the University of Chicago Office of Press Relations. Photographer's stamp.
